descriptions.description: GConf is a system for storing application preferences. It is intended for user preferences; not configuration of something like Apache, or arbitrary data storage.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=gconf PACKAGE_VERSION=3.2.6 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract GConf-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.xz #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
